title: Gian (John) Sandri 2016 Interview #2 - How To Approach The Biblical Texts
description:
How does one approach the Bible? What are the principles of good reading? 
How does one make sense of the biblical texts in the 21st Century? 
The following interview with Gian (John) Sandri was recorded in March 2016 in Huémoz Switzerland in his home. Gian has been involved with L'Abri since 1955 and was one of the very first students to visit the center. He married the Schaeffer's oldest daughter Priscilla. This interview discusses the specifics of Sandri's methods of interpreting the biblical text. For those interested in the history of L'Abri, this will provide additional insights. Gian's ideas were not always approved by L'Abri, yet it is our opinion that his contribution to the work was invaluable. And L'Abri's influence on Christianity was without a doubt crucial to the 2nd half of the 20th century and beyond. 

I can really use the financial support here in Tbilisi Georgia. If you wish to help, contribute here through PayPal. 
https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=G9LDYMSPZ5RGG
If you give $10 a month or more than $50 in one shot you will receive lots of extra content.

Any questions about this interview can be addressed here to Byrne Power. 

Part 1 can be found here: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iUddI0OM68o
To read more about Swiss L'Abri:
http://www.labri.org/swiss/

©2018 Byrne Power

#labri #biblestudy #hermeneuticsbiblestudy
